item.title: Report X-2024040001
item.description:
Report X-2024040001

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-03T15:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-30
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KY, A PREVIOUSLY FLOWN AIR PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED FOURTEEN X 12 OUNCE CANS OF PRECISION COLOR SPRAY AEROSOLS. ONE CAN WAS LEAKING DUE TO A SMALL DENT AND PUNCTURE NEAR THE BOTTOM OF THE CAN. THERE IS AN INNER BOX HOLDING TWELVE OF THE AEROSOLS WITH THE GROUND LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTERMOST BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM TEXAS USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 643Y12, JC FIRE PROTECTION LP, 8323 N ELDRIDGE PKWY, HOUSTON TX 77041-1299.
